subject: CFP:: WCIT2014 Congress- Kuala Lumpur- Malaysia
from: "The Second World Congress on Computing and Information Technology (WCIT 2014)" <donotreply@dcmrf.net>
body:
Please accept our apology for multiple posting. THANK YOU. 
===================================================================

 	           CALL FOR PAPERS
		    2nd WCIT 2014
 Asia Pacific University of Technology & Innovation (A.P.U)
		  March 18-20, 2014
+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-

The Second World Congress on Computing and Information Technologyn(WCIT 2014) would like to invite you to attend the following conferences:

1- The Third International Conference on E-Learning and E-Technologies in Education (ICEEE2014)
http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2014/iceee2014/
===================================================================
2- The Second International Conference on E-Technologies and Business on the Web (EBW2014)
http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2014/ebw2014/
===================================================================
3- The Second International Conference on Technological Advances in Electrical, Electronics and Computer Engineering (TAEECE2014)
http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2014/taeece2014/
===================================================================
4- The Second International Conference on Green Computing, Technology and Innovation (ICGCTI2014)
 http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2014/icgcti2014/ 
===================================================================
5- The International Conference on Game-Theory, Development, and Applications (ICGTDA2014)
http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2014/icgtda2014/
===================================================================
6- The Fourth International Conference on Digital Information Processing and Communications (ICDIPC2014)
http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2014/icdipc2014/
===================================================================
7- The International Conference on Computer Security and Digital Investigation (ComSec2014)
http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2014/comsec2014/


Important Dates
+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+
Submission Deadline:	    Feb. 18, 2014
Notification of Acceptance: March 04, 2014
Camera Ready Submission:    March 08, 2014
Last Day for Registration:  March 08, 2014
Conference Dates:	    March 18-20, 2014

----------------------------------------

If you want to unsubscribe to this mail message from SDIWC, just follow this link http://dcmrf.net/Filemailer2/sdiwc-mailer/unsubscribe.php?id=65b73db1921a24fbe97786870799ab0b
